overview: He has gained his experience in IP prosecution and intellectual asset management both working as patent consultant at the METIDA Law Firm and in laser technology company Altechna. Evaldas holds a double B.S. in Physics/Management and a M.S. in laser technology. His background and professional practice establishes him as top-tier consultant for photonicsâ€™ companies. He has participated in number of event related to patent drafting and technology transfer as well as several years was a voluntary consultant at patent clinics (Patent Information Center at Technical Library Lithuania).

degrees.subject: Management and physics of modern technologies
